scripts.purge:
yarn purge:build && yarn purge:modules && echo "Do NOT forget to re-setup: 

yarn setup
"
scripts.watch: tsc -b -w # WARNING - this might produce unexpected results - see https://github.com/microsoft/TypeScript/issues/33770
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others --names "0: typescript,1: server,2: client" "yarn watch" "yarn dev:server" "yarn dev:client"    # depends on `setup`
scripts.build:old: yarn purge:build && yarn --cwd common build && yarn --cwd scraper build && yarn --cwd server build && yarn --cwd client build
scripts.build:ts:fallback:
npx --package typescript@beta tsc -b && echo "
Used build:ts:fallback!
"
scripts.build: yarn run build:ts && yarn build:client && yarn --cwd server build
scripts.docker:deploy: yarn docker:build && yarn docker:login && yarn docker:push
